column1: The 1964 U.S. escalation in Vietnam was justified.
The U.S. deployment of missiles to Turkey in 1961 was a justified action.
The 2003 U.S. invasion of Iraq was justified.
The use of atomic bombs on Hiroshima and Nagasaki by the U.S. in WW2 was necessary.
The 1983 U.S. invasion of Grenada was justified.
The 1989 U.S. invasion of Panama was justified.
The USAAF's 1945 bombing of Dresden had strategic justification.
